news.headline: Equinor reports $27.654 billion revenue, $5 billion buyback plan, production decline, $7.90 billion income.
news.summary: Equinor ASA's shares dropped after reporting fourth-quarter FY24 results. Revenue decreased to $27.654 billion, with adjusted revenue at $26.418 billion, below the consensus estimate of $25.973 billion. Total equity liquids and gas production fell 6% Y/Y to 2,072 mboe per day, with equity liquids at 1,081 mboe per day. Production on the Norwegian continental shelf remained steady. Average liquids price fell 10% Y/Y to $68.5/bbl, and realized piped gas price was $2.36/MMBtu. Equinor's renewables production increased by 19% Y/Y to 829 GWh. The company reported an adjusted operating income of $7.90 billion, with notable contributions from E&P Norway, E&P International, and E&P USA. Adjusted EPS stood at $0.63. Read more on Benzinga.com.

news.headline: Futuri appoints Marc Jaromin as Director of Public Safety Platforms for BEACON AI system, developed with Univ. of Florida and Florida Division of Emergency Management; led by industry leader Craig Fugate.
news.summary: In Austin, Texas, Futuri, a leader in AI-powered broadcast technology, has appointed Marc Jaromin as the Director of Public Safety Platforms. Jaromin will oversee the expansion of BEACON, the innovative public safety communications system created in partnership with the University of Florida and the Florida Division of Emergency Management. This appointment marks a significant step in the advancement of BEACON as it continues to enhance emergency communication operations.

news.headline: Pitt County in NC partners with PayIt for digital government platform, consolidating several services.
news.summary: In Kansas City, Missouri, PayIt has launched a digital platform that offers numerous services in Pitt County. This platform consolidates multiple services into one, simplifying access for residents.

news.headline: Fed's Barkin: I do worry that de-globalization could be a headwind to US growth.
LucyRx adds Lankford Wade as President and CFO, Lori Hart as CHRO, and Lisa Liburd as VP, highlighting commitment to innovation and growth.
news.summary: In Bethesda, Maryland, LucyRx, a progressive pharmacy benefits manager focused on enhancing prescription care access, revealed the appointment of key executives. Notably, Lankford Wade joins as President and CFO, Lori Hart as CHRO, and Lisa Liburd, PharmD, MBA, as Vice President of Clinical Strategy. These strategic additions highlight LucyRx's dedication to pioneering patient-centric solutions. This move aims to solidify LucyRx's stature as a leading entity in the industry.

news.headline: BigBear.ai wins DoD contract for AI geopolitical risk analysis, advancing VANE prototype. (Character count: 75)
news.summary: BigBear.ai, a prominent provider of AI-driven decision intelligence solutions for defense and national security, has received a contract from the Department of Defense (DoD) Chief Digital and Artificial Intelligence Office (CDAO) to enhance their Virtual Anticipation Network (VANE) prototype. This collaboration aims to bolster the capabilities of BigBear.ai’s technology in assisting the CDAO and Office of the Secretary of Defense (OSD) by utilizing specialized AI models to enhance the evaluation of news media sources. The company, listed on the New York Stock Exchange under the symbol BBAI, is set to play a significant role in advancing defense and security strategies through this partnership.

news.headline: Ferrotec Holdings receives Supplier Excellence Award from Applied Materials for its materials engineering solutions.
news.summary: On February 5, 2025, Ferrotec Holdings Corporation revealed that it received a Supplier Excellence Award from Applied Materials, Inc., the primary provider of materials engineering solutions for the production of nearly all new chips and advanced displays globally. The award signifies Ferrotec's outstanding performance as a supplier to Applied Materials.

news.headline: UTI adds Tesla's 4-month collision repair program to its training offerings at Long Beach campus in Spring 2025.
news.summary: The Long Beach campus of UTI will introduce Tesla's 4-month program in Spring 2025. This new program expansion by Universal Technical Institute will focus on Tesla's START Collision program. The announcement was made in Phoenix on Feb. 5, 2025.

news.headline: Volition to host virtual investor event on Nu.Q® NETs for sepsis management on Feb 14, 2025 at 8:00 AM ET.
news.summary: On February 5, 2025, in Henderson, Nevada, VolitionRx Limited (NYSE AMERICAN: VNRX) shared plans for a virtual investor event scheduled for February 14, 2025, at 8:00 AM Eastern Time. The multinational epigenetics company will showcase its management team led by Dr. Andrew during the event.

news.headline: Kahua introduces Asset-Centric Project Management, revolutionizing construction project processes. ACPM prioritizes assets, industry-first innovation.
news.summary: Alpharetta, GA - On February 5, 2025, Kahua, a leading provider of collaborative solutions for construction project management, announced the launch of Asset Centric Project Management (ACPM). This new approach revolutionizes project management by focusing on assets, thereby transforming the way construction projects are handled. This innovative solution aims to enhance efficiency and effectiveness in the industry.

news.headline: Clean Harbors (NYSE: CLH) to release Q4 & full-year 2024 financial results on Feb 19, with conference call at 9am ET.
news.summary: Clean Harbors, Inc. (NYSE: CLH), a prominent provider of environmental and industrial services in North America, is set to conduct its Q4 and full-year 2024 financial results conference call on February 19, 2025, at 9:00 a.m. ET. During the call, Co-CEOs Michael L. Battles and Eric W. Gerstenberg, CFO Eric J. Dugas, and Senior VP of Investor Relations Jim Buckley will provide insights into Clean Harbors’ performance.

news.headline: TransMontaigne plans $450 million senior notes offering due 2030; proceeds will redeem existing debt.
news.summary: TransMontaigne Partners LLC disclosed plans to launch a private offering of senior unsecured notes due 2030, aiming to issue $450 million aggregate principal amount. The proposed offering, exempt from the Securities Act registration requirements, is contingent on market conditions and additional factors. The company intends to utilize the net proceeds from the Notes offering to redeem all.

news.headline: Amogy expands to South Korea to advance ammonia-to-power solutions, opens office in Pangyo Techno Valley near key stakeholders.
news.summary: Amogy, a company specializing in efficient solutions for converting ammonia to power, has revealed its plans to expand into South Korea by inaugurating an office in Pangyo Techno Valley. This strategic move allows Amogy to be nearer to prominent investors and partners in the region. The expansion places them in proximity to renowned entities such as SK Innovation, Samsung Heavy Industries, HD Hyundai, Hanwha, SV Investment, and Korea Zinc. This development signifies a significant step for Amogy in broadening its global presence and leveraging key relationships in the industry.

news.headline: FibroBiologics hosting in-person Analyst Day for research updates. Also presenting at BIO CEO & Investor Conference.
news.summary: FibroBiologics will be participating in the BIO CEO & Investor Conference to showcase their latest developments. This conference provides a platform for companies to engage with potential investors and industry leaders. FibroBiologics will have the opportunity to present their advancements to a large audience, including key stakeholders. This event will be attended by over 1,000 CEOs and investors, offering valuable networking prospects for FibroBiologics. Their participation in this prestigious conference underscores their commitment to promoting their innovations and attracting investment opportunities.

news.headline: Falco partners with Nettlehurst Capital Advisors, providing advisory services on capital markets. TSX.V: FPC, Feb. 5, 2025.
news.summary: In Montreal on February 5th, 2025, Falco Resources Ltd. (TSX.V: FPC) disclosed an agreement with Nettlehurst Capital Advisors Inc. ("NCA") for advisory services. This deal, as per the TSX Venture Exchange's Policy 3.4, will encompass guidance on capital markets. Falco Resources Ltd. representatives expressed contentment with the partnership.

news.headline: Canada's PM Trudeau: The summit in Toronto will aim to explore ways to grow Canada's economy, make it easier to build and trade within the country, and diversify export markets - Statement.
Southwest Airlines declares $.18 per share dividend for 184th quarter to Shareholders of record by March 12, 2025.
news.summary: In Dallas on February 5, 2025, Southwest Airlines Co. (NYSE: LUV) Board of Directors announced a quarterly cash dividend of $.18 per share for Shareholders recorded by March 12, 2025, on all existing shares.

news.headline: Rakuten introduces Programmatic Loyalty: AI-driven ad solution assures ROAS for retailers. Increased performance with low risk.
news.summary: A cutting-edge solution has been introduced by Rakuten, the primary Cash Back shopping platform headquartered in San Francisco, on Feb 5, 2025. This pioneering development, named Programmatic Loyalty, is designed to assist retail marketers in refining their Cash Back budgets to enhance performance while minimizing financial risks. This innovative advertising tool aims to revolutionize the industry by optimizing the allocation of resources and boosting effectiveness for retailers.

news.headline: Synergy for Change Award given to Morgan Stanley GIFT Cures and Harrington Discovery Institute for collaboration at DAF Giving Summit.
news.summary: The recent recipient of the Synergy for Change Award, presented during the 2024 Donor Advised Funds (DAF) Giving Summit in Nashville, Tennessee, was Morgan Stanley GIFT Cures. This award celebrates successful collaboration between for-profit and non-profit organizations, recognizing their notable impact. The event, held on February 5, 2025, highlighted the significant achievements of Morgan Stanley GIFT Cures in combining efforts to make a difference.

news.headline: Canada's PM Trudeau announces Canada-US economic summit, February 7 -Statement.
Texas Reliability Coalition launched to boost grid resilience with utility-scale microgrids in Texas.
news.summary: A new initiative called the Texas Reliability Coalition has been launched in Houston to enhance the grid resilience and reliability of Texas. This effort will focus on implementing Utility-Scale Microgrids to achieve these goals. The initiative aims to address the energy policy issues in the state and ensure a more stable and reliable energy supply.

news.headline: Global cytogenetics market valued at $2.8 billion in 2023, estimated to reach $10.6 billion by 2035 with 11.7% CAGR.
news.summary: The global cytogenetics market was valued at $2.8 billion in 2023 and is projected to reach $10.6 billion by 2035, with a compound annual growth rate (CAGR) of 11.7% from 2024 to 2035. Prime factors for this growth include the increase in genetic disorders, the adoption of personalized medicine, and technological advancements. However, high costs of equipment and procedures are hindering market growth. Research and development focus and growth potential in emerging countries present new opportunities.

news.headline: RFG Advisory partners with TrekNorth Investment Management and Matterhorn Private Wealth to launch independent firms in Colorado and upstate New York.
news.summary: In Birmingham, Alabama, RFG Advisory, a leader in the wealth management sector dedicated to supporting independent financial advisors and their clients, has revealed the addition of two new advisor partner firms. TrekNorth Investment Management, established by Jarrod Biebel, AIF®, bolsters RFG's influence in Colorado. On the other hand, Matterhorn Private Wealth, founded by James Horn, CRPC, CLTC, and with two offices in upstate New York, indicates an expansion in their reach.

news.headline: Global wind turbine market valued at $66.9 billion in 2023, expected to reach $164.3 billion by 2033 at 9.5% CAGR, per Allied Market Research.
news.summary: The wind turbine market, as per Allied Market Research's report, was valued at $66.9 billion in 2023 and is projected to reach $164.3 billion by 2033, with a growth rate of 9.5% from 2024 to 2033. The report covers various segments including axis type, installation, component, application, and region. Growth determinants include innovations in design and efficiency, though challenges like environmental concerns exist. The industry is poised for growth with increased digitalization and smart turbines. The report spans 321 pages and focuses on the period from 2024 to 2033.

news.headline: Workday plans to lay off around 2,000 employees to prioritize profitability.
Prosegur Security partners with Kinetic Global to enhance global risk management solutions.
news.summary: In Deerfield Beach, Florida, Prosegur Security has announced a partnership with Kinetic Global to enhance their global risk management offerings. This collaboration aims to provide comprehensive security solutions for clients worldwide. This move signifies Prosegur's commitment to offering top-notch executive protection services. The new partnership is expected to significantly boost Prosegur's capabilities in managing risks on a global scale and ensuring the safety of their clients.

news.headline: Fed's Barkin: It's useful to look at 2018 and 2019 experience, most of the studies suggest those delivered 30-40 basis points of inflation in an era with little inflation.
Fed's Barkin: What happened then was consumers kept spending, businesses kept hiring but big businesses cut investment.

Fed's Barkin: There's 3 levels of uncertainty with tariffs, first is what level on what countries, and the next is what response countries and companies will have, and finally, how is all this going to land on the consumer.

AMD shares fall after Q4 results, with revenue at $7.66 billion (beat $7.53 billion estimates) & EPS at $1.09 (beat $1.08 estimates). Data Center revenue at $3.9 billion, up 69% YoY, below expectations of $4.14 billion. Technology growth concerns.
news.summary: AMD stock is experiencing a decline this morning after the company released its fourth-quarter financial results. The Q4 revenue was reported at $7.66 billion, surpassing estimates of $7.53 billion. Adjusted EPS for the same period was $1.09, slightly higher than the estimated $1.08. The total revenue saw a 12% increase year-over-year, driven by Data Center revenue of $3.9 billion, showing a significant 69% rise compared to the previous year. Despite this growth, the Data Center figures fell short of analysts' expectations of $4.14 billion. The underperformance in the Data Center segment seems to be the key factor contributing to the stock's drop as investors focus on AI growth. Multiple analysts have also reduced price targets following the financial report.

news.headline: Fed's Barkin: Interest rates should only rise if the economy is overheating.
KYOCERA AVX releases SpiCAT SpiSCAP software for evaluating supercapacitors in various industries.
news.summary: Engineers now have access to the latest SpiCAT SpiSCAP online engineering simulation software, which simplifies the process of assessing and choosing SCC and SCM Series supercapacitors. These high-performance supercapacitors are specifically engineered to tackle common power issues across various sectors including industrial, energy, automotive, transportation, telecommunications, and commercial building. The software aims to streamline the selection process for engineers working in these industries, offering them a convenient tool to address their power challenges effectively.

news.headline: LitWorld celebrates 15 years of World Read Aloud Day, a global movement inspiring millions to share the joy of storytelling.
news.summary: LitWorld is excited to begin the 15th-anniversary festivities of World Read Aloud Day™, a global movement initiated by LitWorld in 2010. This event brings together millions of individuals to celebrate storytelling and promote literacy. World Read Aloud Day is observed on the first Wednesday of each February. The initiative aims to unite book enthusiasts, educators, and readers of all generations in sharing the love for reading.

news.headline: ABS Kids to enhance autism care by opening new centers and providing group therapy in 2025.
news.summary: ABS Kids, based in Salt Lake City, is working towards increasing access to ABA therapy by launching additional centers and providing group therapy sessions. This initiative aims to enhance the availability of services and cater to a larger number of individuals in need of therapy.

news.headline: The Emily Program offers specialized care for ARFID in Durham, NC, catering to individuals with the often misunderstood condition.
news.summary: In Durham, North Carolina, The Emily Program, a prominent provider of eating disorder and behavioral health services, unveiled upgraded specialized treatment services for individuals in the state dealing with Avoidant/Restrictive Food Intake Disorder (ARFID). This condition, often underrecognized but severe, impacts individuals of all age groups. ARFID has been garnering increased attention within the healthcare sector. The newly enhanced services aim to cater specifically to those grappling with ARFID in North Carolina, addressing the needs of this demographic.

news.headline: Chatham Lodging Trust to hold Q4 2024 earnings call on Feb 26, 2025 in West Palm Beach, Florida.
news.summary: Chatham Lodging Trust has revealed that their fourth quarter 2024 earnings call is scheduled to take place on Wednesday, February 26, 2025, in West Palm Beach, Florida. This announcement signifies a crucial event for the trust and its stakeholders, where key financial figures and insights for that period will be shared. Shareholders, analysts, and interested parties are encouraged to mark their calendars for this important date. Such updates are vital for maintaining transparency and keeping stakeholders informed about the trust's performance and future prospects.

news.headline: Allot to release Q4 & full year 2024 results on Feb 25, 2025. Conference call at 9:00AM ET. (GLOBE NEWSWIRE)
news.summary: In Hod Hasharon, Israel, on February 5, 2025, Allot Ltd. disclosed its plan to hold a conference call regarding its financial performance for the fourth quarter and full year of 2024. The call is scheduled for February 25, 2025, at 9:00 AM Eastern Time, 2:00 PM in the UK, and 4:00 PM in Israel. Allot Ltd., a prominent global supplier of advanced network-centric cybersecurity and network intelligence solutions for communication service providers and enterprises, trades on the NASDAQ under the ticker symbol ALLT and on the TASE under the same symbol.

news.headline: Global CIO study shows ROI is top barrier to AI adoption, despite 3x spend increase. Expect AI spending to triple by 2025.
news.summary: In Morrisville, North Carolina, recent research commissioned by Lenovo from IDC reveals that AI adoption is set to increase significantly. Business leaders and IT decision-makers anticipate that the use of AI will become mainstream, with organizations dedicating a larger portion of their IT budgets to AI initiatives. The global 2025 CIO Playbook, titled "It's Time for AI-nomics," projects that AI spending by IT decision-makers worldwide is expected to nearly triple by 2025 compared to the previous year. However, there are challenges to overcome, including financial uncertainties.

news.headline: NextGen Healthcare ranked #1 Behavioral Health Solution by KLAS for 2nd year in a row based on feedback from healthcare professionals.
news.summary: A company based in Salt Lake City, NextGen Healthcare, known for its innovative healthcare technology solutions, has recently shared news of their achievement in the field of behavioral health. The company announced that their NextGen® Behavioral Health Suite has been ranked as the top Behavioral Health solution by KLAS for two consecutive years. The rankings were part of the 2025 Best in KLAS: Software & Services Report, which gathers feedback from numerous healthcare professionals nationwide. This recognition is significant for NextGen Healthcare as it highlights their continued excellence in the field.

news.headline: Calix to participate in upcoming investor events: Morgan Stanley on March 3, 2025, and ROTH Capital Partners on March 17, 2025.
news.summary: Calix, Inc. (NYSE: CALX) from San Jose, California, has revealed its participation in two upcoming investor events. The first event is the Morgan Stanley Technology, Media & Telecom Conference scheduled for March 3, 2025, at 1:05 p.m. Pacific Time in San Francisco, CA. The participants include Carl Russo, Chairman, and Cory Sindelar, CFO. The second event is the ROTH Capital Partners 37th Annual Conference set for March 17, 2025, in Dana Point, CA, with Cory Sindelar, CFO, as the representative.

news.headline: Applause has surpassed $200M in ARR, expanding innovation in crowdtesting and AI integration.
news.summary: In Boston today, Applause, a top provider of digital quality and crowd-sourced testing, revealed a successful year by exceeding $200 million in Annual Recurring Revenue (ARR). The company demonstrated substantial progress by enhancing customer interactions, forming key partnerships, receiving industry recognition, and making advancements in artificial intelligence (AI) technology integration and testing. This achievement highlights Applause's dedication to quality and innovation, solidifying its position in the market.

news.headline: Johnson Controls reports Q1 sales of $5.43 billion, beating estimates. Adjusted EPS of $0.64 beats $0.59 consensus. Gross profit rises to $1.92 billion.
news.summary: Shares of Johnson Controls International plc (NYSE: JCI) saw an increase in premarket trading on Wednesday. In the first quarter, the company reported a sales growth of 4% year-on-year, reaching $5.43 billion, surpassing the expected $5.29 billion. The adjusted earnings per share (EPS) stood at $0.64, outperforming the estimated $0.59. Gross profit for the quarter grew by 8.3% to $1.92 billion, with a gross margin of 35.5%. Meanwhile, selling, general, and administrative expenses rose by 4.8% to $1.39 billion. Income from continuing operations also saw a 6.2% increase, reaching $361 million, while the operating margin expanded by 10 basis points.

news.headline: Applause partners with Webex by Cisco to enhance user experiences for all, including people with disabilities, expanding testing coverage and expertise.
news.summary: In Boston, a well-known company in digital quality and crowd-sourced testing, Applause, has revealed an extension of its collaboration with Webex, a key player in collaboration technologies from Cisco. This partnership aims to improve user experiences, catering to all individuals, including those with disabilities. Under the widened accessibility testing and training agreement, Applause will conduct continuous conformance evaluations for more products in order to enhance inclusivity.

news.headline: Illinois Tool Works (ITW) Q4 earnings beat estimates with EPS of $2.54 (2.0% increase), revenue down $51M.
news.summary: On Wednesday, February 5, 2025, at 08:00 AM, Illinois Tool Works (NYSE:ITW) released its Q4 earnings report. The company exceeded earnings expectations by 2.0%, with an EPS of $2.54 compared to the estimated $2.49. However, their revenue decreased by $51.00 million from the previous quarter. The detailed announcement can be found on Benzinga.com.

news.headline: Lucky Strike (NYSE: LUCK) surpassed estimated earnings by 78%, reporting an EPS of $0.16 in Q2 2025.
news.summary: Lucky Strike (NYSE: LUCK) revealed its Q2 financial results on February 5, 2025, at 07:30 AM. The earnings report showed that the company outperformed estimated earnings by 78.0%, recording an EPS of $0.16 compared to the projected value.

news.headline: Aurora Cannabis (NASDAQ:ACB) surprised with Q3 earnings, beating estimates by 925.0% with an EPS of $0.41.
news.summary: On Wednesday, February 5, 2025, at 07:00 AM, Aurora Cannabis (NASDAQ:ACB) disclosed its Q3 earnings. The report revealed that the company exceeded projected earnings by an impressive 925.0%. Their earnings per share (EPS) stood at $0.41, whereas the initial estimate was [provide estimate if available]. For more details, the complete story is accessible on Benzinga.com.

news.headline: Griffon (NYSE:GFF) exceeded Q1 earnings estimates with EPS of $1.39 (17.0% above estimate of $1.19).
news.summary: The first-quarter earnings for Griffon (NYSE:GFF) were released on Wednesday, February 5, 2025, at 07:30 AM. In the report, Griffon surpassed anticipated earnings by 17.0%, posting an EPS of $1.39 compared to the expected $1.19. Further details on the revenue can be found on Benzinga.com.

news.headline: 3M boosts dividend to $0.73/share for Q1 2025, a 4.3% increase from previous. Approves $7.5B stock buyback.
news.summary: 3M Company (NYSE:MMM) has announced a dividend of $0.73 per share for the first quarter of 2025, scheduled for distribution on March 12, 2025. Shareholders must be recorded by February 14, 2025, to qualify for the dividend. This new dividend marks a 4.3% increase from the previous quarter's $0.70 dividend. Additionally, 3M has authorized a buyback of up to $7.5 billion. For further details, the complete story can be found on Benzinga.com.

news.headline: FirstService (NASDAQ:FSV) Q4 earnings report missed estimated earnings by -3.0%, reporting EPS of $1.34.
news.summary: On Wednesday, February 5, 2025, FirstService (NASDAQ:FSV) released its Q4 earnings at 07:30 AM. The company fell short of estimated earnings by -3.0%, with an EPS of $1.34, compared to expectations. For a detailed report, the full story can be found on Benzinga.com.

news.headline: Reservoir Media (NASDAQ: RSVR) Q3 earnings exceed estimates by 167%, reporting EPS of $0.08.
news.summary: On February 5, 2025, Reservoir Media (NASDAQ:RSVR) published its Q3 earnings at 07:00 AM. The standout figure from the report was the earnings surpassing expectations by 167.0%, revealing an EPS of $0.08 compared to the estimated amount. Further details can be found on Benzinga.com.
